dcterms:creator: Oliver Ferschke
Torsten Zesch
Iryna Gurevych
dcterms:description: A temporal graph containing 9,227 nodes and 157,474 temporal directed edges, representing a month of modifications made by contributors on Wikipedia pages. Dynamic labels indicate whether contributors are temporarily banned from editing.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia

dcterms:creator: Xingtong Yu
Zemin Liu
Yuan Fang
Xinming Zhang
dcterms:description: A dynamic network between posts and users on subreddits, consisting of about 11,000 nodes and 672,447 temporal edges. Dynamic labels indicate whether a user is banned from writing posts.
dcterms:title: Reddit

dcterms:creator: Xingtong Yu
Zemin Liu
Yuan Fang
Xinming Zhang
dcterms:description: A user-course network representing actions taken by students on a MOOC platform, with 7,144 nodes and 411,749 edges. Dynamic labels indicate whether a student drops out after an action.
dcterms:title: MOOC
